document.full_text: nigerian president goodluck jonathan was sworn in for his first full elected term at the helm of africa's most populous nation sunday, faced with the challenge of driving reform and trying to heal regional rifts.
document.title: nigeria's jonathan sworn in for first full term
lines_and_colors: nigerian president goodluck jonathan was sworn in for his first full elected term at the helm of africa's most populous nation sunday, faced with the challenge of driving reform and trying to heal regional rifts.
